channel.title: Contest sites on New Zealand Programming Contest
channel.description: Recent content in Contest sites on New Zealand Programming Contest

item.description: <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/strict.dtd"> New Zealand Programming Contest (Whitireia Site Page) Whitireia NZPC Site Page The next NZ Programming Contest is Saturday August ?th, 2024 Local site information (at Whitireia Polytechnic) Venue Details needed! Languages GNU C/C++ Version 10.2 (Linux) Java OpenJDK V11.0.14 Other languages can possibly be supplied if requested sufficiently in advance. OS/Hardware/etc We will use the DOMjudge automated judge system for running the contest. Timetable 12:30pm Registration and Briefing (required attendance) in E223 12:45pm - 1:45pm Practice session---to get used to the equipment and the method of result submission 1:45pm - 1:55pm Everyone thrown out of the lab so we can get it cleared for the contest 2pm - 7pm The actual contest E203/E204 7:30pm With luck the country wide provisional results Registration If you're competing at the Whitireia site, please contact Chalinor (email below).
